resources.string: Thanks for installing. This app will guide you through a few steps to disable your camera. First, press the button to give this app permissions to disable the camera.
Now, press the button to disable the camera.
The camera has been disabled, but not permanently. Follow the instructions at disablecamera.com to permanently disable the camera. You\'ll need a computer.
The camera has been permanently disabled. Visit disablecamera.com for more information.
